posts.post_content:
All cards have a clean Piedmont back.  Prices are shipped.
Karger- light crease thru neck- $25

Becker- Light crease thru glove- $25
Hunter- no creases- $25
Brashear- no creases- $25
Seymour- crease at thigh, dent left border- $25
Killian- light web creasing, chip right border-  $25
Pastorius- no creases-$25
Ball- light creasing upper left- $20

Doug,
I just sent payment for the Killian and the Karger.  Thanks again!
George Gogol
